data.title: Kinder chocolate 'contain dangerous levels of likely carcinogens'. The European Food Safety authority calls the chemical found in the chocolate as 'likely carcinogenic and mutagenic'

In aging Japan, the 18-year-old voter gets welcomed to the voting booth: In the biggest expansion of the vote since 1946, teens are being courted ahead of Sunday's vote for the legislature's upper house. A key issue: the pacifist Constitution.

Borneo's orangutan is on the verge of extinction, a top conservationist body said on Friday (Jul 8), also warning that the world's biggest fish, the whale shark, and a hammerhead shark species were endangered.
